items.sentence: The police are investigating the cause of the accident.
The shirt Tom was wearing today was made by his mother.
There are a lot of stars which are larger than our sun.
Tom becomes nervous whenever he has to speak in public.
Tom will never forget all the time Mary spent with him.
There are people who think pineapples grow underground.
A liter of milk contains about thirty grams of protein.
I still think Tom doesn\'t understand what\'s going on.
Tom isn\'t the only one who didn\'t attend the meeting.
Have you ever dealt with this kind of a problem before?
